hero.title: Candela Mangino Soroa
hero.subtitle: Computer Engineering student, creative technologist, and vibrant storyteller from Uruguay.
hero.quote: I code like a composer and design like a choreographer — every interaction is a note in the experience.

about.heading: About Candela
about.body: I am a Computer Engineering student who blends logic and artistry. From playful interactive installations to thoughtful software systems, I build experiences that feel alive. I believe in technology as a canvas for empathy, delight, and meaningful change.
about.highlight: Based in Montevideo, Uruguay · Bilingual (ES/EN) · STEM & Arts advocate

timeline.title: Student Assistant · Universidad de la República
timeline.description: Supporting introductory programming courses with creative labs that connect code, music, and visual arts.

timeline.title: Experience Designer · Boutique Hotel
timeline.description: Crafted sensory welcome experiences combining ambient lighting, projection mapping, and bespoke playlists.

timeline.title: Hackathon Catalyst
timeline.description: Led a team in a sustainability hackathon, prototyping an IoT concept to reduce water waste in Montevideo.

hover.hackathon: Awarded honorable mention for social impact

projects.note: Each project is a playground where empathy meets computation.

art.heading: Art & Creativity
art.description: Color is my native language. I draw inspiration from Río de la Plata sunsets, electronic music, and the play of light on rainy streets. My illustrations, photography, and audiovisual experiments celebrate curiosity and the poetry hidden in algorithms.

human.heading: The Human Side
paragraphs: I mentor young girls entering STEM, sharing tools to trust their voices.
I recharge through analog photography, journaling, and longboard rides along the rambla.
I love collaborating with musicians, chefs, and dancers to co-create multisensory adventures.

contact.heading: Let's Make Magic
contact.copy: Tell me about the experiences you dream of building. I am ready to collaborate on software, installations, and everything in between.
